Class Spawner

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.GameObject
sk.stuba.fiit.entities.Entity
sk.stuba.fiit.entities.Spawner
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Cloneable, Damageable, Mortal, Tickable
public class Spawner extends Entity implements Cloneable, Tickable, Damageable, Mortal
Represents a spawner entity in the game that can attack using ranged weapons, be damaged, and die. Implements Cloneable, Tickable, Damageable, and Mortal.

  • Constructor Details

    • Spawner

      public Spawner(String name, String description, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, int health, int maxHealth, Weapon weapon, int price, Timer timer)
      Constructs a new Spawner with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the spawner
      description - the description of the spawner
      texture - the texture of the spawner
      health - the current health
      maxHealth - the maximum health
      weapon - the weapon used by this spawner
      price - the price (reward) when this spawner is killed
      timer - the spawn/attack timer

    • attack

      public void attack(Entity target, Collection<Projectile> projectileEnvironment)
      Attacks a target entity if the spawn timer has elapsed, using the current weapon and ranged strategy.
      Parameters:
      target - the entity to attack
      projectileEnvironment - the environment to which projectiles are added

    • die

      public void die()
      Kills this spawner. Triggers the EnemyKilledEvent and sets the entity as not alive.
      Specified by:
      die in interface Mortal

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Applies damage to the spawner. If health drops to 0, it dies.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Damageable
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to apply

    • clone

      public Spawner clone()
      Creates a copy of this spawner, optionally cloning its timer and visual properties.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      the cloned Spawner

    • onCollision

      public void onCollision(Entity collisionEntity)
      Handles collision with another entity. If the collider is a PlayerProjectile, takes damage from it.
      Specified by:
      onCollision in class Entity
      Parameters:
      collisionEntity - the entity collided with

    • tick

      public void tick(float deltaTime)
      Called on each game tick. Advances the internal spawn timer.
      Specified by:
      tick in interface Tickable
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time since last update in seconds
